action-group.diy-instructions:
Save and upload the changed files. Go to ACP and refresh template.
Make sure to create thumbnails! Else the mod wont work. Go to ACP -> General -> Attachment settings Scroll down to: Image category settings [Assigned extension group: Images] Make sure that Create thumbnail are set to Yes and Maximum thumbnail width in pixel is set to 250px (Just a suggestion. You can set the width as you want)
